nodes.text: Ivo Coveney was the Costume Props Supervisor for Phantom Menace, Attack of the Clones, and Revenge of the Sith. He was the supervisor in charge of the team of people who crafted Vader's new set of armor, making it serve a dual purpose. Not only was it designed to fit Hayden Christensen, but it provided an opportunity for the department to correct many of the flaws inherent in the original costume, such as the asymmetrical nature of the mask.
